title: Drama Ahead As NBA Season Gets Underway
teaser: As the NBA season tips off, the story lines include LeBron James' return to Cleveland and the Clippers' fresh start post-Donald Sterling.
contentencoded:
LeBron James returns to Cleveland. The Clippers get a fresh start in the post Donald Sterling era. Derek Rose hopes to stay healthy in Chicago. Those are some of the story lines as the 2014-2015 NBA season tips off tonight. ESPN’s Kevin Arnovitz joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with details.
